desc.brif:
AED 4,000 (Valued at AED 5,400)

Reveal a confident, blemish-free complexion through a curated blend of science-backed treatments and holistic care.

What’s Included


  1. 1. Expert Skin Consultation : In-depth skin analysis with a medical aesthetician Full review of diet, lifestyle, hormone history & skincare regimen (bring your products) Custom acne treatment plan designed to suit your skin’s unique needs
  2. 2. In-Clinic Treatments (Tailored Based on Severity and Skin Type) : Up to 2 Chemical Peels (Salicylic or Customized Medical Peels), 2 Acne Hydrafacials, 2 LED Light Therapy Sessions (Blue Light), 3 PRP Treatments, 2 IV Drips (Detox or Skin Glow)

Add-On Options (Preferential Pricing for Package Clients):

- Medical Grade Skincare at 20% off

- Additional PRP or Peels at 15% off

- Hormonal panel testing or nutritionist session

Why This Works


This comprehensive program tackles acne at every level—surface, hormonal, bacterial, and lifestyle. Whether your acne is stress-induced, hormonal, or chronic, this package is designed to reset your skin, repair damage, and build long-term clarity and confidence.

Continue to Booking
Our Hair Loss Package offers a thorough, personalized approach to help you address this issue effectively. Here's how we handle hair loss:

ul.liTitle: Consultation with Doctor Noemie Vezina – 1 of 8 doctors in Canada on the hair loss consensus will assess your needs
Medical assessment – scalp examination to determine the causes (hormonal, nutritional, stress, genetics, or other)

desc.brif: Our Pigmentation Package offers a personalized and comprehensive approach to address various types of pigmentation, ensuring you receive the most effective treatment for your specific needs. Here's how we handle pigmentation:

ul.liTitle: Consultation with expert – not all pigment are the same and it should not be treated as such ex. Melasma
Establish type of pigment (sunspot, melasma, age, or other)
Full review of current face care routine (bring your products)
Complete package offering including based on the person – Price is $4,750 for the package value $6,000:
subLi: Up to 2 Nano Laser Peel or Chemical Peel

desc.brif: At SABBYA, we offer a comprehensive solution to help you achieve smoother, younger-looking skin. Here’s how we handle wrinkles:

ul.liTitle: Complete package offering including based on the person – Price is 200 AD for the package value $5,100:

Up to 2 HALO or 3 Morpheus 8 treatments
